title: Coordinate a Utility Shutdown
description: To tie in the new water line, the water supply to the existing building must be shut down for four hours. The site manager must coordinate this.

tasks.description: Notify all building occupants of the planned water shutdown, providing the date, time, and duration.
tasks.expected_outcome: A notification is sent to all affected occupants.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the plumbing subcontractor to ensure they are ready to perform the tie-in during the shutdown window.
